short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Online Weather Dash New Tab is the free extension for getting online weather forecast.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Online Weather Dash New Tab is a functional tool that provides detailed 5-Day weather forecast for your city, as well as an exceptional custom search experience powered by Bing.

Online Weather Dash is a easy-to-use extension that transforms your New Tab into a practical dashboard, displaying current date and time, temperature in Celsius of the city you are located in, additional information about the current city and country, and a comprehensive five-day weather forecast.

Staying updated on weather conditions is important, and this convenient extension simplifies the process, allowing you to effortlessly track the weather. The user-friendly interface and intuitive UI are thoughtfully designed to enhance your convenience.

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to install "Online Weather Dash" Chrome extension and hereby agree to set Chrome New Tab to that provided by the service and the Privacy Policy and Terms of Use.You may remove this extension at any time from the chrome extension page.

Visit our website at https://onlineweatherdash.com/
Read About us: https://onlineweatherdash.com/about-tab/
Read our Privacy Policy: https://onlineweatherdash.com/privacy-policy/
Read our Terms and Conditions: https://onlineweatherdash.com/terms-conditions/
Uninstall Instructions: https://onlineweatherdash.com/uninstalling-a-chrome-extension/
